name: Asteroid Crusher
description:
Asteroid Crusher is a top-down interestellar shooting game where players play as a spaceship trying to survive the dangers of outer space while collecting resources.

Shoot your enemies as soon as you see them, collect all the experience and try and gather as many points as you can. Dodge as many asteroids as possible.

Choose your upgrades wisely and, over all, have fun shooting!

This game supports keyboard and touch controls. Best played in fullscreen.

Google Play release comming soon!

Controls

  • 'A' and 'D' Keys - Movement
  • 'Mouse' - Menus
